title: Copper Beech Grove: A Different Kind of Love
description: A Mystery That Becomes A Horror. A Nightmare That Becomes A Warning. A Love Story That Ends With Fear. Donald Shetland had sensed it the night of Stephen Peel's suicide, the night his own dreams of a death that was not death waited on the other side of the door...a door to which one woman held the key. There are some doors that should never be opened.
author: Barbara Pintoro
